#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t,num;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		int n;
		cin>>n;
		int rcount[100] = {0},ccount[1000] = {0},c1,c2,count1 = 0, count2 = 0;
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
		for(int j=0;j<n;j++)
		{
			cin>>num;
			if(num)
			{
				rcount[i]++;
			    ccount[j]++;
			}
		}
		for(int i= 0;i<n;i++)
		{
			if(rcount[i]%2)
		    {
		    	count1++;
		    	c1 = i+1;
		    }
		    if(ccount[i]%2)
		    {
		    	count2++;
		    	c2 = i+1;
		    }
		}
		if(count1==1&&count2 ==1)
		cout<<"("<<c1<<","<<c2<<")\n";
		else
		if(count1+count2==0)
		cout<<"1\n";
		else
		cout<<"0\n";
	}
	return 0;
}
